Expression:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Expression#ExpressionFHIR R5 ComplexType `Expression` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Expression` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Expression`.
Expression.description (description):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Expression#Expression.descriptionElement `Expression.description` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Expression.description`.

Expression.expression (expression):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Expression#Expression.expressionElement `Expression.expression` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Expression.expression`.
Expression.reference (reference):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Expression#Expression.referenceElement `Expression.reference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Expression.reference`.

name: ConceptMapR5ExpressionElementsForR4Expression
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
